title: ACOTAR Powers & Magic
description: Test your knowledge of Fae abilities and magic!

questions.question: What ancient artifact can transform humans into Fae?
questions.explanation: The Cauldron is an ancient, powerful artifact that created the world and can transform beings.

questions.question: What unique power does Feyre gain from the High Lords?
questions.explanation: When Feyre was resurrected, each High Lord contributed power, giving her abilities from all seven courts.

questions.question: Rhysand is the most powerful High Lord in Prythian's history.
questions.explanation: Rhysand is stated to be the most powerful High Lord ever to exist, partly due to his unique heritage.

questions.question: What is a mate bond in the ACOTAR universe?

options.text: A destined soul connection between two beings

questions.explanation: A mate bond is a deep, unbreakable soul connection that the Cauldron creates between destined pairs.

questions.question: What ability does Rhysand's daemati power give him?
questions.explanation: As a daemati, Rhysand can read minds, communicate telepathically, and manipulate thoughts.

questions.question: Nesta becomes a Made being after being put in the Cauldron.
questions.explanation: After being forced into the Cauldron, Nesta emerged as a Made Fae with significant powers she stole from it.

questions.question: What special powers do Seers have?
questions.explanation: Seers can see visions of possible futures, like Elain who gained this ability from the Cauldron.

questions.question: What curse was placed on the Spring Court in the first book?

options.text: All Fae had to wear masks

questions.explanation: Amarantha cursed the Spring Court, forcing all Fae to wear masks until true love broke the curse.
